long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a very simple tool that when clicked it converts the URL of the tab you have open into a QR code as a PNG file. The size of the PNG is 999px x 999px and uses the largest error correction. 

It was created for a warehouse stock system that uses a URL in the form of a QR code to pick and ID stock items. The tool being used was slow and unreliable, using this is faster without clicking options every time a QR code is needed or waiting for an ad pop up times out.

This extension is useful for quick QR codes to use on posters and for promotional media that points to a URL.
